<a id="EditorResourceConversionPlugin"></a>

# EditorResourceConversionPlugin

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Plugin for adding custom converters from one resource format to another in the editor resource picker context menu; for example, converting a [StandardMaterial3D](StandardMaterial3D.md) to a [ShaderMaterial](ShaderMaterial.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**EditorResourceConversionPlugin** is invoked when the context menu is brought up for a resource in the editor inspector. Relevant conversion plugins will appear as menu options to convert the given resource to a target type.

Below shows an example of a basic plugin that will convert an [ImageTexture](ImageTexture.md) to a [PortableCompressedTexture2D](PortableCompressedTexture2D.md).




```gdscript
    extends EditorResourceConversionPlugin

    func _handles(resource: Resource):
        return resource is ImageTexture

    func _converts_to():
        return "PortableCompressedTexture2D"

    func _convert(itex: Resource):
        var ptex = PortableCompressedTexture2D.new()
        ptex.create_from_image(itex.get_image(), PortableCompressedTexture2D.COMPRESSION_MODE_LOSSLESS)
        return ptex
```




To use an **EditorResourceConversionPlugin**, register it using the [EditorPlugin.add_resource_conversion_plugin()](EditorPlugin.md#EditorPlugin_method_add_resource_conversion_plugin) method first.

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="EditorResourceConversionPlugin_private_method__convert"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Resource](Resource.md) **_convert**\ (\ resource\: [Resource](Resource.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorResourceConversionPlugin_private_method__convert)

Takes an input [Resource](Resource.md) and converts it to the type given in [_converts_to()](EditorResourceConversionPlugin.md#EditorResourceConversionPlugin_private_method__converts_to). The returned [Resource](Resource.md) is the result of the conversion, and the input [Resource](Resource.md) remains unchanged.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorResourceConversionPlugin_private_method__converts_to"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](String.md) **_converts_to**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorResourceConversionPlugin_private_method__converts_to)

Returns the class name of the target type of [Resource](Resource.md) that this plugin converts source resources to.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorResourceConversionPlugin_private_method__handles"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **_handles**\ (\ resource\: [Resource](Resource.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorResourceConversionPlugin_private_method__handles)

Called to determine whether a particular [Resource](Resource.md) can be converted to the target resource type by this plugin.
